text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium atramentosum is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which produces tannase.
text.Further reading:
Selwal, M. K.; Yadav, A; Selwal, K. K.; Aggarwal, N. K.; Gupta, R; Gautam, S. K. (2011). "Tannase Production by Penicillium Atramentosum KM under SSF and its Applications in Wine Clarification and Tea Cream Solubilization". Brazilian Journal of Microbiology. 42 (1): 374–87. doi:10.1590/S1517-83822011000100047. PMC 3768918. PMID 24031644.
Selwal, Manjit K. (2011). "High-level tannase production by Penicillium atramentosum KM using agro residues under submerged fermentation". Annals of Microbiology. 62 (1): 139–148. doi:10.1007/s13213-011-0238-1.
